modName: Berserk - Mercenary or Similar Blackswordsman Armor
summary: A similar Blackswordsman Armor from the manga Berserk...
descriptionHtml:
BLACKSWORDSMAN ARMOR - ver.1.2.

A similar Blackswordsman Armor from the manga Berserk.
This mod uses the meshes of the game combined, and the textures of mods from other authors. Don't use the textures without the permission of the original authors.

The Blackswordsman Armor doesn't replace anything, it's a standalone armor with its meshes and its textures. You can create it at forge (steel category) or buy it from Alvor in Riverhood.

Updates:
- 1.2: fixed crashes when you equip/unequip the armor, added cape and shoulder straps.


Credits:

- MagnumWarren for Chest textures, from "True Iron Armor".
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3781&navtag=file/images.php?id=3781&tab=3

- Zerofrost for Shoulder textures, from "Razor scales Armor and Cannibal Lord Mask".
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1907&navtag=file/images.php?id=1907&tab=3

- Phate3 for the esp, the brainstorming and the betatesting.
author: Eferas
